identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a visceral, immersive Gothic/Medieval interface that breaks standard SaaS conventions.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Medieval aesthetics with modern UX.
Emotion First: Every interaction must feel mysterious and weighty.
Content is King: The text is an ancient script; the data is arcane knowledge.
Zoom In: Focus on texture and detail (stone, paper, metal).
Negative Space: Use deep shadows as negative space.

fonts.usage: Subheadings (H3, H4), UI Labels, Buttons, Navigation

rules: Use 'UnifrakturMaguntia' for all major titles to establish the medieval theme immediately.
Use 'Cinzel' in uppercase with wide tracking (tracking-widest) for UI labels (e.g., 'ARCHIVE', 'LOGIN').
Use 'Lato' for long-form text and chat messages to ensure perfect readability.
Headings must be large (text-4xl+) and dramatic.
Text colors should never be pure white; use 'Antique White' (#e0e0e0) or 'Parchment' (#d4c4a8).

usage_rules: Backgrounds must be deep black or very dark grey.
Use 'Blood Red' for primary actions (CTAs, Submit) and critical alerts.
Use 'Deep Night Blue' for secondary backgrounds or active states.
Use 'Antique Gold' for borders, icons, and highlights to add a 'royal' touch.
Gradients: Use subtle radial gradients (black to dark red/blue) to create a 'vignette' or 'torchlight' effect.

textures.name: Stone Wall
textures.usage: Background overlay with low opacity (5-10%) and blend-mode-overlay.

textures.name: Old Parchment
textures.usage: Card backgrounds or modal backgrounds with multiply blend mode.

effects: Glassmorphism: Use heavy blur (backdrop-blur-xl) with a dark tint (bg-black/80) for overlays.
Borders: Use double borders or gold borders (border-accent) to simulate metal frames.
Corners: Use sharp corners or slightly rounded (rounded-sm) - avoid fully rounded 'pill' shapes unless it's a magical orb.

layout.spacing: Generous (p-8, p-12) to create a sense of grandeur and scale.
layout.container_style: Containers should look like stone tablets or ancient scrolls.
rules: Mobile-First: Stack elements vertically on mobile.
Desktop: Use asymmetric grids (e.g., Chat panel 2/3 width, Info panel 1/3 width).
Alignment: Center headings for dramatic effect, but keep body text left-aligned for readability.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or slight bevel. Primary button: Blood Red bg, White text, Gold border. Secondary: Transparent bg, Gold border, Gold text.

inputs.style: Dark background (bg-black/50), Gold border (border-accent/50), Parchment text.

cards.style: Dark stone background (bg-card), thin border (border-border), shadow-lg.

chat_interface.style: The 'Scribe's Log'. Messages appear on a dark, semi-transparent surface.
chat_interface.user_message: Aligned right, Dark Blue background (bg-secondary), Gold text.
chat_interface.ai_message: Aligned left, Dark Grey background (bg-muted), White text, Gothic font for the sender name.

navigation.style: Sticky top or side rail. Glassmorphism effect. Icons should be mystical (scrolls, quills, swords, shields).

icons.library: Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons (if available)

motion.entrance: Fade in with slight upward movement (y-4 to y-0).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is readable against dark backgrounds. Use 'text-gray-200' or lighter.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (Blood Red or Gold) for keyboard navigation.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts imports to 'index.css' immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the provided color palette and font families.
3. GLOBAL STYLES: Apply the dark background and base font colors in 'index.css'.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, override the default 'rounded-md' with 'rounded-sm' or 'rounded-none' to fit the Gothic theme.
5. IMAGES: Use the provided texture URLs for backgrounds. Do not use placeholders.
6. ICONS: Use Lucide-react icons but style them with the 'accent' color (Gold).
7. NO LIGHT MODE: Enforce dark mode classes globally.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no default shadows.
Create depth: Use z-index and layered backgrounds (texture > overlay > content).
Micro-animations: Every hover must feel responsive.
Spacing: Use p-6 or p-8 for internal card padding.
Toasts: Use 'sonner' for notifications, styled with dark backgrounds and gold borders.
